Posts.Content: Thanks for that ...I might up the vitamins already having load of veggies so will pop some vit tabs in the old diet as well, and lets see what happens ...fingers crossed for both of us ...
Posts.Title: PICO Vac

Posts.Content: Hi I had a Vac fitted on Friday..The wound under my boob is not healing after the op ..(I am 6 weeks post op) .To start with the PICO was fine and no pain but today day 4 its really sore ...anyone any thoughts ...I am of a view that I need to go back and see the wound nurse again at the hospital
Posts.Title: PICO Vac

Posts.Content: Thank you Your comments are very helpful .. In just waiting for radiotherapy but they say cannot do until this has healed as large and looks like a graft site but my chin is up and it will be what it is  Thanks  Rosemary
